entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING

entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS MORNING, THEN SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY THIS AFTERNOON
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
